name: Rigged and Rolled
description:
This game is made in 48 hours for BYOG 2022.

The game uses themes "It is not supposed to do that" and "It makes total sense".

A ghost tries to steal your puppy for itself. It challenges you to defeat it in a rigged game.

You play soccer with it on a golf field because it makes total sense.

Can you win the puppy back?

Thanks to ansimuz for the beautiful soundtracks & Bevoullin for the puppy, boy & ghost sprites.
